lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I am a huge supporter of Micro Credit and want to be involved in it deeply. I'm always looking for ways to involve myself in such an organization and supporting kiva through my small donations is a step in the direction I want my life to go.
lender.occupational_info: Instead of making our marketing decisions strictly off of revenue, I facilitate conversation between our clients and their customers so we can get first hand knowledge of the user experience. It makes our work a whole lot more relevant!

lender.name: Karen & Keith
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are grateful for the richness of our lives and we believe that by sharing we will enrich another's life and from there it goes on and on and on.
lender.occupational_info: We are gardeners, we love the soil and all the bounty that comes from it.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: Over 2 Billion people live on less than $2 per day. The Lord calls us who have more, to aid those with less. Helping hard working people trying to move forward brings joy!

lender.name: Darrell Keith
lender.loan_because: It's real, not cosmetic charity.
lender.occupational_info: I develop business idea's, throw it on the wall to see if it sticks.

lender.name: Beatrice
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to walk the talk.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: These people have so little. If I can just help a little bit, I feel like I can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I provide roofing and insulation for the construction business to keep people confortable in their homes.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Our church mission committee has decided to use a portion of our outreach to help individuals as well as organizations
lender.occupational_info: I work in the mortgage industry finding management talents.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: it's important

lender.name: Lainie
lender.loan_because: I admire the men and women across the world who want to start businesses that will improve their lives and the lives of their families. To somewhat paraphrase Dom Helder Camara, it isn't enough for us to feed the poor...we need to ask why it is that they're hungry and how to change the cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze research projects such as focus groups and surveys to help media companies decide how to program their products.

lender.name: Dominique Graham
lender.loan_because: I want to lend my support to others who are going after their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Making the world more beautiful one face at a time. I invent and create products to add positively to people's lives.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I think this may be the only way to truly bridge the divide between the developed and developing worlds, and hopefully make both better in the end. Plus I'd like to do my part to restore some of the goodwill that used to exist between the US and the rest of the world, which seems to have been all but lost.
lender.occupational_info: I install, manage, and maintain computer networks for small and medium sized business along the East Coast.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupation: Life Coach, Author, and Spiritual Teacher
lender.loan_because: it's an empowering way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help others find ways to empower themselves so they can live the life they dream about.

lender.name: Kerri
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives me the chance to leverage my small contributions in a huge way that changes the lives of others, and the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Communications and Fundraising manager for a nonprofit organization that helps launch and support high school debate leagues in urban areas throughout the U.S.

lender.name: Gwyneth&Robert
lender.loan_because: We want to share our good fortune with others
lender.occupational_info: Bob is a surgeon and nutrition guru, Gwyn is a citical care nurse working in the organ donation field

lender.name: Mosi
lender.occupation: Nonprofit Housing Developer and Service Provider
lender.loan_because: true peace comes from social justice and economic equity.
lender.occupational_info: I am the executive director of Housing Initiative Partnership, fondly referred to as HIP. HIP is an innovative nonprofit developer based in Prince Georges County, Maryland dedicated to revitalizing neighborhoods. HIP creates housing and economic opportunities for persons of low and moderate income and provides services that improve the quality of life in the communities we serve.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.occupational_info: I work for a not-for-proft organization.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us...Therefore we want to be a blessing to others!

lender.name: Lunchbox Collective
lender.loan_because:
We are all connected at an invisible level. We are all brothers and sisters who belong to the same family. It is only an illusion that we are separate.
This holiday season Martin and I have concluded that we are all cut from the same cloth and we realize that the noblest thing we can do is to give to others so that they may experience the joy of owning and growing their own business.
It is in this spirit that we present you with a small token of our affection so that you may inspire and share the spirit of the holidays with small entrepreneurs around the globe.
Happy Holidays from Lunchbox Collective, Martin & Richard
lender.occupational_info: Our association of web professionals, produces award winning web site designs.

lender.name: Audra & R.J.
lender.loan_because: one finger cannot lift a pebble.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: giving the money to business owners provides no long term support!

lender.name: donna
lender.loan_because: I love to watch/hear about poor people being successful by improving the life of their family and community

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Madeleine
lender.loan_because: I would like to give others the same chance as I have been given. I would like to help people improve their living conditions.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: it is a very direct way to make a difference for a someone.
lender.occupational_info: I'm helping to build a new law school at the University of California, Irvine.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: it can make a difference in a person's life and to build and be connected to the larger community of the world.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it is important to understand the interconnectedness among people and thus help in ways that are ethical and respect people's own choices. Micro-lending redistributes wealth in ways that respect people's autonomy and culture.
lender.occupational_info: I understand how the stuff people make (artifacts) and the way in which it is made (process) help define what it means to be human.

lender.name: Niki
lender.loan_because: it helps to build and sustain individual lives, and ultimately communities.
lender.occupational_info: I research and communicate environmental and biological science messages for non-government organizations, aboriginal groups and government agencies like Parks Canada.

lender.name: Elisabeth and Joseph
lender.occupation: I\'m a teacher and my husband is a produce salesman

lender.name: Grzegorz
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own little business.

lender.name: Jack & Hazel
lender.loan_because: We believe that most people just want a hand up not a hand out. It brings us great satisfaction to help in some small way, and to play a part in our global community.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to help someone else get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: Approve and decline loan requests from people wanting to use their home as collateral.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: actions speak louder than words

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional sports photographer

lender.name: Manish
lender.loan_because: To make a difference

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering people to help themselves is the best way to build strong, self-sustaining communities.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who develop web-based software solutions for clinical trials.

lender.name: Steve & Jenny
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are entrepeneurs too. We enjoy the interaction with people around the world.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life have the things i have, live the way live and especially the place where I live. But I wouldn't be if it weren't for others helping me. So it is a great feeling to know that I am helping those who are less fortunate while I am still recieving help myself. To know that with our help we can change someones life is really just a wonderful emotion.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Receptionis/Front Office Clerk at the beautiful place of Ko Olina, in which I am recieving a full scholarship from. With my schoalrship I am going to college to get a Degree in Education, so I can fulfill my own dream as becoming a Elementary School Teacher.

lender.name: Margarite
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward. I have had the good fortune to be born in a country of great opportunity... I want to give opportunities to others!
lender.occupational_info: I work with clients on portal and software implementations.

lender.name: Gerry
lender.loan_because: How amazing that so little money can make such a huge difference in the life of a family and communitiy.
lender.occupational_info: I provided nursing services to infants, children, their mothers, schools and the community as a whole.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: The proper use of capital can create wealth in so many ways.

lender.name: Holly&Trent
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I create learning tools that make education fun and easy.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: I help people with financial organization and strategy to accomplish their goals.

lender.name: denomas
lender.loan_because: it is so much cooler than more christmas presents!
lender.occupational_info: student, soccer player, princess, nephew, niece

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea, and it's what Mom wanted for Christmas. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I represent makers of Organic and Natural Foods to retailers in the Midwest of the United States. On the side I do what I can to be an actor in Film and TV.

lender.name: Izzy
lender.loan_because: I like help the unfortunate people who really needs the money

lender.name: David & Juli
lender.loan_because: it is better to give than to recieve... unless you can give and get repaid and then give again!
lender.occupational_info: david works to develop affordable housing and revitalize neighborhoods. juli is a free lance photographer.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure business software systems are implemented and managed successfully.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: Teaching my children to do the right thing, . . .just because it's the right thing to do. No personal gain. Just helping others in need.

lender.name: Kristf
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ann & Nadeen
lender.loan_because: If you have the available income to help other people we think you should.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference.

lender.name: Chris & Andy
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference.

lender.name: Lina Lindstrm
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loans is a way to help people to help them self. As I have my own business I also like the idea to help others to develop their businesses :-)
lender.occupational_info: I take care of of pet dogs coats for people that don't have the time or knowledge. You can say I'm a hairdresser for dogs ;-)

lender.name: susan lynn
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I support kiva's mission of micro-financing. I believe everyone should have a chance.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: The best route to freedom and prosperity is via small businesses where people can make a future for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired engineer.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It's a very easy and painless way to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a university and I'm involved in local music organization and a non-profit that is raising funds to fight HIV/AIDS.

lender.name: -googles-
lender.loan_because: I feel I am very blessed to have the things I have. I like to help people that are hard working and show that they appreciate the help and will pay back what they can.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I believe people who are fortunate enough to live comfortably should help people who do not have that opportunity.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: My wife turned me on to Kiva. This is a great way to reach out to people who need a helping hand, and in a tangible, personal way. We're going to tell all our friends about Kiva.

lender.name: BETHANY
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Lis
lender.loan_because: Helping one benefits all.

lender.name: Kay and Robert
lender.loan_because: it's a joyful thing to do and we're lucky enough to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Robert makes beautiful, colorful upholstered furniture.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I can and because I believe everyone should have access to resources that can improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the Animal Control Shelter in Fairbanks, Alaska.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I hope to contribute towards making someones dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: My main job is in construction sales and my second job and true passion is photography.

lender.name: Bob & Penny
lender.loan_because: We've been the recipients of good luck, friends, family and good health ourselves. Perhaps a gram of our good fortune, shared with someone else, can become a tonne of good fortune for them.
lender.occupational_info: Bob worked in engineering for a nuclear power generating company. Penny worked to sell advertising time for television stations.

lender.name: Kipp
lender.loan_because: Our youth group is trying to be more socially aware...
lender.occupational_info: I teach the Bible to students

lender.name: Ron and Judy
lender.loan_because: The world is a very small community. It could easily be us and our family asking for a little help had it not been for our grandparents' determination to have a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Our occupations allow us the privilege of working with teachers and students. Helping every student think and learn will improve their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Maia
lender.loan_because: everyone has dreams. Some people just have a harder time getting started financially. Many of us in the US take for granted what we have. I loan because it helps me value what I have and keeps things in perspective.

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: It helps me to feel connected.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker. My home is the Earth and so I am a Peace and Environmental activist. My passion is Organic Gardening.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to share some of it
lender.occupational_info: I taught at a university

lender.name: Elena and Alex
lender.loan_because: We want to help people and our parents are teaching us about giving to others.
lender.occupational_info: Alex is 7 years old and Elena is 5 years old. They are both in school.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it feels good and I can.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: "...at the end of every hard earned day, people find some reason to believe." -- Bruce Springsteen

lender.name: Lee
lender.occupational_info: I assist groups and individuals in creating their desired futures.

lender.name: Michael & Michelle
lender.loan_because: it gives people a chance to control their own destiny

lender.name: Greg
lender.occupational_info: Resident in Radiation Oncology

lender.name: Wayde Christie
lender.loan_because: It's nice to help folks who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: If everyone contributed just a little, then collectively big changes can happen.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in learning new computer applications, I also create small database application to solve small business problems.

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: I want to make someones life better.
lender.occupational_info: mechanic

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift and I am happy share it and learn from others.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy building lasting customer relationships by sharing my product knowlege and training customers how to best use their products.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: wealth should be distributed
lender.occupational_info: computer repair

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupation: Unemployed IT Management, looking for work

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer system implementation projects.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to teach our children compassion for people in different cultures. If we can help in any small way, it makes us feel great!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children and work at their school. I also design and plant flower containers for homes and businesses.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to make a difference. I love that the money can be loaned out over and over, so that I can help more people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, and play music on the side.

lender.name: Stephen Rowe
lender.occupational_info: I research people and foundations to ascertain their inclination and ability to donate to the University of Auckland.

lender.name: Kori and Lisa
lender.loan_because: Lending money directly to people allows them to make their own choices. They know what they need and are empowered to be in control of their business.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineering student, learning to develop and design renewable energy sources and Lisa is an interior designer and marketing manager.

lender.name: Dee-Dee
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for what I have.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: If my small loan can help someone I'm happy to do it. The world needs more givers.
lender.occupational_info: It gives more to me than I to it. Teaching is a privalege.

lender.name: Michael, Julie & Henry
lender.loan_because: "If you want peace, work for justice" Pope Paul VI

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I am moved by the entrepreneuring spirit of these many individuals and the difficult circumstances they must overcome to find success!
lender.occupational_info: I am the chief administrator , Head, of a 125 year old coed independent (private) school of 850 PK-12 students in Pittsburgh,PA

lender.name: Bear
lender.loan_because: We are all family. I have been blessed in life. It feels good to share.
lender.occupational_info: Lifelong teacher, actor, director, dancer.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of allowing people to learn to help themselves. Another good cause is the "Invisible Children"(TM) campaign. Check it out.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Kiva helps bring out the good in people - where else can a small amount make such a difference?
lender.occupational_info: I love airplanes, helping people, and watching my kids grow.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: If each of us does just one thing to help someone appreciate the goodness of the American people, perhaps we can change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I raise contributions for a large, Midwest research university. I have also created an etiquette and protocol consulting business.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have extra and want to help others. I enjoy being able to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I handle all of the operational aspects of a Company that designs data centers and keeps them cool and running 24/7. We are a $30M dollar Company with branches throughout the Southwest of the United States.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can, I believe in people, and I have a soft spot in my heart for entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Cris
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with what I have and I have a responsibility to share it with others!
lender.occupational_info: I teach conversational English using the Bible

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have a chance to better themselves and find more financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a food market balancing our daily finances.

lender.name: jonathan6439
lender.loan_because: ...why not?

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: people are dieing!!!!
lender.occupational_info: continuous

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: it is right to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a second grade elementary school teacher. I currently have 20 second grade students who are ages 7 and 8 years old. One of my goals as a teacher is to provide my students with the understanding that they have the power to make good choices. I hope by showing and involving them in reaching out to others at a young age, that it will hopefully ignite the spark needed to make them lifetime givers. I'm a teacher who loves his job!

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jordi
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my nieces and nephews that their help in changing peoples lives is vastly more important-- and more rewarding-- than their having one more gift for the holidays
lender.occupational_info: For twenty five years set up almost 800 music concerts a year. Now I do something completely different-- I restore old houses.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Everyone of us has the ability to change the world!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of people that fix computers and help answer computer questions.

lender.name: Brent Poliquin
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people with the ambition to help themselves and their family.

lender.name: Monte
lender.loan_because: my cousin Christina made me do it.
lender.occupational_info: I sell used cars.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am truly grateful for all the opportunities I have been given in life and want to show my gratitude to Gods Spirit, that lives in me.
lender.occupational_info: I have been working in the Health Care field for several years and look foward to doing God's work for several more years to come.

lender.name: Austin
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Shepherd Valley Waldorf School

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the ability to achieve their goals. I believe this is one of the best ways for me to promote peace and be active in parts of the world I may never see.

lender.name: john
lender.whereabouts: Potts Point, Sydney New South Wales

lender.name: Shauna
lender.loan_because: It's amazing feeling to help other people out and to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy my job. I help my boss build her company - so to help some one outside this country, is a wonderful thing.

lender.name: Reilly
lender.occupational_info: public interest lawyer working on hurricane disaster recovery in Mississippi

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: to help poeple

lender.name: linda
lender.occupational_info: i help bring new medicines onto the market

lender.name: Stan & Robin
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and want to share with others less fortunate...

lender.name: Holly&Eric
lender.occupational_info: I help keep the water clean.

lender.name: Ritcheson grand children
lender.loan_because: I thought this would be a good way to help out and to teach my grandchildren about helping others. I can show them where the money went to on the map and I let them help pick out who we make a loan to.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: None of my other financial institutions pay social dividends.

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I work for a rehabilitation company in a hospital. My role is to help people get back to productive and meaningful work after an injury.

lender.name: Phaedra
lender.loan_because: If we all just did a little thing...
lender.occupational_info: Inspiring people to share a little of their good fortune with those less fortunate to work toward equality, peace and justice in the world.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I'm excited about this format of helping others. What a great way to bridge the gap between the economies of industrialized and developing countries
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room and take care of people who are acutely ill.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I meet with people and we talk about their goals and things that get in the way of them reaching them.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: Even small deeds make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Office worker

lender.name: Vanessa Fuller
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to people that have not had the opportunities that I have had. Also to give in lieu of gifts to people I want to honor but do not need any gifts.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing and business development

lender.name: Donna V
lender.loan_because: I can see that these loans are of a great value to those people to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: computer network consultant

lender.name: EricandLea
lender.loan_because: We want to share part of what God has given us to help the poor and see them realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Eric teaches students about stars, black holes, and the universe, and Lea runs our home and spends her day taking care of our son.

lender.name: dika
lender.loan_because: even small loans can make a big difference .
lender.occupational_info: My work is to help people

lender.name: Shayne
lender.loan_because: It honors God, and it helps people to help themselves and others. What a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I play music and teach people how to play music.

lender.name: Catherine Tchen
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be self employed and would like others to experience the same opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: We design, hand make and sell online over 14,000 art rubber stamps. We use our links page to promote animal and human welfare organizations.

lender.name: Jeff

lender.name: The Hans Family
lender.loan_because: Our family is so blessed we really consider ourselves incredibly lucky to be able to help out others work toward their goals and realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info:
We help other people start their own home business and become financially independent. You can do it too!
"Don't say it if it isn't true" and " Don't do it if it isn't right"

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: we have been so blessed and want to give to others

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I got help from a few people, with a few dollars that helped me start my business 15 yrs ago. I know how much a little bit helps and the confidence it gives you that others believe in you.
lender.occupational_info: I create internet web sites with a staff of 8 other people. I meet with business people, many times small businesses like the ones on Kiva, and help them decide what to put on their web site.

lender.name: Carlotta
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the World.
lender.occupational_info: Experiencing life by meeting new people every day of my life.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want people around the world to be given a chance to succeed, and I really appreciate hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student hoping to attend school for Natural Medicine, and I work as a chef at a local restaurant.

lender.name: Himanshu
lender.loan_because: I dont believe in charity and micro finance is sustainable development.
lender.occupational_info: I work on new ideas to make world a better place

lender.name: Gaurav
lender.loan_because: the best kind of help is when people help themselves. Sometimes all you need to do is grease the wheels
lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of an eco-tourism resort (www.rainforesttreehouses.com.au) and work on development projects related to environmentally sustainable development

lender.name: Lorel and Terry
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference to someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Lorel teaches people about relationships and sexual health.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand now and then. I know how frustrating it is to be able to see what you want to do so much, but can't because money is short.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a mulit-national company in an office in Brighton, in the UK. I sit at a desk from 7am to 3pm updating documents for the sub contractors to my company to work to. This makes sure that they are working safely and within the law.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: (I have loaned too little to answer this question in good conscience)
lender.occupational_info:
I strive to do the following:
Assist business leaders in 1) Analyzing their business' past performance and identify trends 2) Given the historical analysis, I try to help struture a plan for the future and 3) Once the future plan has been developed, I try to help execute the plan and help them achieve the results they desire.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it can be to get started on your own and with few resources. Having traveled in Asia and Africa, I've seen how a little can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and teach English a few hours a week.

lender.name: lechte_sthyarra
lender.loan_because: feed a man(woman) fish ... teach him(her) to fish...

lender.name: Raph
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship is one of the way out of poverty

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed with so many good gifts and want to express my gratitude for them by helping others improve the quality of their lives.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I care about helping small business entrepreneurs succeed.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of helping other and I believe it is right thing todo.
lender.occupational_info: I sell medicine to doctors

lender.name: Anne-Sophie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Siddharth
lender.loan_because: I'm an arm chair volunteer. Poverty is something that I want to be involved in doing something about but possibly don't have the time...
lender.occupational_info: Look after Marketing for 4 businesses of a Business Process Outsourcing comapny in India

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a little better.
lender.occupational_info: I edit For Dummies manuscripts and manage authors.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of giving hope and opportunity to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Government. I help to determine the value of the buildings we have offices in.

lender.name: Gigi
lender.loan_because: I can. Microlending is more proactive and supportive than more traditional charitable giving. And I like that-ideally-it can be self-perpetuating.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teachers to develop hands-on classroom activities

lender.name: Delta Team
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping to create a positive change in someone's life. My eighth grade students have raised the money for the two borrowers and have actively participated in the selection process by making campaign posters, writing essays, and giving campaign speeches. It has been a wonderful melding of persuasive writing (curriculum) and humanitarian work. Plus, their perspectives have grown to include their influence in a global community.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to 13/14-year-old boys and girls.

lender.name: Skjerning
lender.loan_because: ... I Care!!!

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: To help others have hope and a passion for their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture windows for homes in the US

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: My sister suggested we make loans instead of giving each other Christmas gifts. It was a good idea!

lender.name: Carolyne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: THere is such a need in Cambodia. I was in Cambodia, Laos and Thailand this year and am trying to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer products

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: Although I grew up in the U.S., I was born in Lima, Peru. As a child visiting my home country, I saw poverty firsthand, but I also saw people who were willing to work hard to survive. I am proud to be Peruvian and want to give a small helping hand to people who really need it.
lender.occupational_info: I promote a classical, jazz and world music concert series at a university. I also sing in group called Five2 and volunteer my time to support the arts and culture in my city .
